model:object-assembly.persist:object-mapped-query: SELECT PREVIOUS, STEP FROM PROGRESSIVE_STATES WHERE MODULE_ID = :moduleId:VARCHAR
model:object-assembly.persist:parametric-query: SELECT PARAM FROM PROGRESSIVE_STATES WHERE MODULE_ID = :moduleId:VARCHAR
model:object-assembly.persist:parametric-statement: MERGE INTO PROGRESSIVE_STATES USING (VALUES( :moduleId:VARCHAR, :previous:VARCHAR, :step:INTEGER, SUBSTR(COALESCE(:param:VARCHAR, ''), 1, 1024) )) AS D(I, V, P, M) ON PROGRESSIVE_STATES.MODULE_ID = D.I WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET STATE = NULL, PREVIOUS = D.V, STEP = D.P, PARAM = D.M WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MODULE_ID, PREVIOUS, STEP, PARAM) VALUES D.I, D.V, D.P, D.M

MERGE INTO PROGRESSIVE_STATES USING (VALUES( :moduleId:VARCHAR, :state:VARCHAR, SUBSTR(:param:VARCHAR, 1, 1024) )) AS D(I, S, M) ON PROGRESSIVE_STATES.MODULE_ID = D.I WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET STATE = D.S, PARAM = D.M WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MODULE_ID, STATE, PARAM) VALUES D.I, D.S, D.M
